verbs.description: [ARG0: iraq parliament] [V: okays] [ARG1: 14 ministers for new cabinet] the iraqi parliament approved 14 new cabinet ministers thursday proposed by prime minister - designate adel abdel mahdi even as key portfolios such as defence and interior affairs remained unassigned an official said fouad hussein parliament adel abdul mahdi prime minister kurdistan washington cabinet mohammed al halbusi saleh tehran iraq saddam hussein national assembly of south korea adil abdul mahdi barham salih mohammed al - halbusi president barham saleh abdel mahdi council of representatives of iraq afp iraqi parliament thamer abbas ghadbane
